page.title: 13 Traffic Survey
page.content: There are three important roads in our region: Bedford Rd (A.6.) links Rusden and Bedford; Newton Rd linking Rushden and Newton Bromswold; and Avenue Rd a link between Newton Rd and the A.6. We surveyed these roads. Bedford Rd: The most important road, carrying same amount of traffic in both directions(630 vehicles/hr). The volume doubles the rush hour 70% of this were private cars, 12% vans, 10% lorries and the rest other vehicles. Noise readings showed Â£Rush hour':- min=40decibels, max=86Db. ave=76Db.; Â£Off peak':- min=20Db. max=86Db. ave74Db. Newton Rd: Carried about 160 vehicles per hour, with the same volume travelling in both directions. 75% of this were private cars travelling out of Rushden though 89% were cars going into Rushden. Ave. Rd: 75%-80% cars.90 vehicles/hr.
